, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract* , Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract*, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Fragrance (100% Essential Oils) *Certified Organics
